situation: A bolted connection uses A325 bolts in a friction type connection with an allowable shear stress of 145MPa. If P=150kN,

subquestions.question: Which of the following most nearly gives the polar moment of inertia of the bolt groups in mm<sup>3</sup>?
Which of the following most nearly gives the maximum reaction of the bolts in kN?
Which of the following most nearly gives the reaction of bolt A in kN?
